title: US Parents Sue Over Clandestine Covid-19 School Vaccination Programme Which Does NOT Require Parental Consent – Climate Depot
cleaned_text: If you live in Washington DC, and your child comes home a bit wobbly, there is a chance the school you entrust with their care just gave them a clandestine Covid jab. Without talking to you about it first, or even warning you afterwards to keep a close watch on your child for adverse vaccine reactions.
